title: Easy Creamy Chicken Casserole
description: This creamy chicken casserole is baked with a buttery cracker crust. It's easy to prepare in advance for a comforting meal on busy weeknights.
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Combine crackers and melted butter in a bowl; set aside.
Bring water and chicken stock to a boil in a pot over high heat; season with salt and pepper. Add chicken; reduce heat to a simmer, and cook until no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Whisk cream of chicken soup and sour cream together in a large bowl. Stir in cooked chicken, then transfer mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and top is lightly browned, 25 to 30 minutes.
